Steven Jackson - Gulp Environment

Description

Basic template for building landing pages efficiently using SCSS and Gulp.

Installation

"$ npm install" the root directory
"gulp" the directory for node express server
Navigate to "http://localhost:3000/" and Happy coding

Default Development environment

-- Default Structure --

-- src
   -- css
   -- img
   -- js
   -- sass
- index.html

Distribution Build

Minified version of Development environment

-- Usage --

Run "gulp dist" in your CLI

-- Build sequence --

clean - Clear directory
concat-css - Combine and minify CSS
min-html - Minify HTML
replace - Replace "/src/" with "./"
copy - Copy files to "dist" directory

-- Distribution Structure --

-- dist
   -- css
      - bootstrap.min.css
      - bundle.min.css
      - styles.css
      - styles.min.css
   -- js
      - bootstrap.js
      - bootstrap.min.js
      - jquery-1.11.2.min.js
      - modernizr-2.8.3-respond-1.4.2.min.js
- .gitignore
- .htaccess
- Gulpfile.js
- *.html
- package.json
- Readme

Production Build

Non-minified version of Development environment

-- Usage --

Run "gulp prod" in your CLI

-- Build sequence --

prod-clean - Clear directory
prod-concat-css - Combine CSS
prod-replace - Replace "/src/" with "./"
prod-copy - Copy files to "prod" directory

-- Production Structure --

-- prod
   -- css
      - bootstrap.min.css
      - bundle.min.css
      - styles.css
      - styles.min.css
   -- js
      - bootstrap.js
      - bootstrap.min.js
      - jquery-1.11.2.min.js
      - modernizr-2.8.3-respond-1.4.2.min.js
- .gitignore
- .htaccess
- Gulpfile.js
- *.html
- package.json

Image compression

Compresses images within the "src" directory using Tinypng API and copies it to "/dist/img/" and retains structure

-- Usage --
Run "gulp tinypng" in your CLI

Description:
-- dist
   -- img
      -- retain-folder-structure
         - example-img.png
   - example-img.png

Debug Tools

"/src/css/styles.css" is used for debugging the processed scss file located in "sass/styles.scss"

! --- IMPORTANT --- !

REMOVE/COMMENT OUT: "css/styles.min.css" from "/src/index.html" before compiling to dist

Additional Notes

Replacing "/src/css/bootstrap.min.css" with the Development/Custom version of bootstrap can be done.
